DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare effect dexmedetomidine propofol pulmonary mechanic intensive care patient .
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study compare effect propofol dexmedetomidine pulmonary mechanic . Sixty patient mechanically ventilate intensive care unit include study . Patients divide two random group , Group P ( propofol ) Group D ( dexmedetomidine ) . Propofol infusion 0.5-2 mg/kg/h give Group P patient dexmedetomidine infusion 0.2-0.7 mcg/kg/h give Group D patient sedation . Initial blood gas analysis , airway resistance ( cmH2O/L/sec ) , positive end-expiratory pressure ( PEEP , cmH20 ) , frequency ( breath/min ) , tidal volume ( mL/min ) , minute volume ( mL ) , peak airway pressure ( cmH20 ) , compliance ( mL/cmH20 ) , endtidal CO2 ( mmHg ) , SvO2 ( % ) value record . This parameter evaluate Drager Evita 4 ventilator record 5th,15th,30th,45th 60th minute . Sedation observe use Riker Ramsey Sedation-Agitation Scale . Compliance patient mechanical ventilation observe record . The primary outcome measure airway resistance peak airway pressure . Secondary outcome measure sedation score .
DOC.criteria: The patient mechanically ventilate intensive care unit Patients contraindication use propofol dexmedetomidine
